articles.content:

articles.title: NTSB - Man, not boy, driving truck that hit University of the Southwest golfers' van, had meth in system
articles.description: A Texas man, not his 13-year-old son, was driving the truck that crossed into the oncoming lane and struck a van carrying New Mexico college golfers, killing nine people, and he had methamphetamine in his system, the NTSB said.

articles.title: Oregon Ducks' Spencer Webb, 22, dies after striking head in fall
articles.description: Oregon tight end Spencer Webb, 22, died after striking his head in a fall near Triangle Lake, a location popular for cliff jumping and natural rock water slides.
articles.content:
Oregon tight end Spencer Webb died Wednesday in a recreational accident, Lane County Sheriff's Office announced Thursday. He was 22 years old.
